features.feature1: login authentication for user and admin integrated using firebase
features.feature2: User can see tha product details
features.feature3: Payment method is added using Stripe
features.feature4: Both user and admin can update profile
features.feature5: Users can manage orders and also cancel them
features.feature6: Admin can give set the role of other users to admin
